issues_reports.text: @ThrillerMicJack @AskFrontier Yeah I think cus my **** is down to
@FrontierCorp My internet is out. The box has a red light at the internet signal. I have reboot to no avail. Please advise if this outage is in cerritos California

Day 3 of the @FrontierCorp outage in Sarasota and they've actually stopped giving helpful updates about what's going on and have reverted to "we have top men working on the issue and can't tell you anything else" So I guess find a Starbucks WFH folx.
@FrontierCorp So you won't say why or what the issue is... and that there is no timetable for this to be fixed? Could be days,  weeks, who knows.  Got it.  I think my employer can work with that 😑
@FrontierCorp I just said that link doesn't work for me

@FrontierCorp You said it's been resolved, still out, sent me a link to chat that doesn't work and told me to call customer service. Been on hold for 30 minutes. Needless to say, your social media direct messaging system is awful. I've even out of internet since 2pm Wednesday.
@FrontierCorp internet is down with a blinking white eero. Need some help here. Is there an outage? I need to do some work. Fix it asap.
Day 3 of @AskFrontier’s service bring down in #Tampa. These guys are the worst. Time to bail out.

@FrontierCorp 
PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF @babyyodaaah 

FIX THE OUTAGE! It’s BEEN 3 DAYS NOW!

WE PAY FOR “SERVICES” that DO NOT EVEN WORK OR EXIST!

@StevieTGaming_ @FrontierCorp "Yes, the issue is that we had a fire in a central office and a lot of equipment got damaged either burned or wet, we have a lot of customers in the whole state impacted, and our technicians are working hard to have the service restored” the “update” I got..3rd day of lies.

@FrontierCorp Why? To get another set of lies. 3rd day in a row of saying it’s one thing or another. Why not give a real update. If it’s a DNS error or a DDOS tell us thatS not a power outage, cut fiber/power line or now there was a fire..

@FrontierCorp "Yes, the issue is that we had a fire in a central office and a lot of equipment got damaged either burned or wet, we have a lot of customers in the whole state impacted, and our technicians are working hard to have the service restored” 3rd day of different lies…

@HeyBeadGuy @FrontierCorp It's gotta be a cut line or (lines) that their whole infrastructure is down.

Just giving us information like that and being transparent would at least make this a bit easier to handle. But no information is makes the frustration worse.
@shhaaaron @AskFrontier I just got off the phone with Frontier… they’re long story short is everyone is still without service. No estimated time for it to be done
@BalducciLele @FrontierCorp I bet Jay is a swell dude. To bad he works for a not so swell company.

@FrontierCorp @ZachT_941 It’s absolutely TERRIBLE. I’ve been told 3 times this morning that the service in my area, Tampa Heights, has been restored and to unplug my equipment for 2-3 minutes. That should “fix it.” Nope. And how does that fix a cut fiber line @FrontierCorp? Sad sack of a provider.

@FrontierCorp YOUR MONOPOLY OF COVERAGE IS A JOKE!

You “COVERAGE IS SOOOOO RELIABLE”

That is a CONCEPT!
LIKE A DRAWING OF PINOCCHIO! 
I’m a real boy!
(NOT)

I DON’T LIE
(NOT)
THIS IS A SIMPLE OUTAGE
(GTF out of here)
This is like asking people who failed math to take a test!

@Hambone_Clown @FrontierCorp I’ve been messaging @FrontierCorp and they told me the outage has been restored. Nope. It hasn’t. Going on day 3 here and if it continues today I’m sure it won’t be fixed over the weekend.

@AskFrontier when emailing customers that have your service I frequently get warnings the email messages are delayed - seems to happen a lot with @frontier.com accounts.  Who can I contact to be sure our email server isn't being blocked?

@shhaaaron @FrontierCorp @Le_Furreh Still down in Tampa Heights. They keep saying it’s been resolved but it hasn’t and somehow I have a service request in for 10 PM tomorrow when I never scheduled anything. Don’t bother messaging them here. You’re just talking to a bot.
@FrontierCorp Now that’s Customer Care

@FrontierCorp No it hasn’t been fully restored, upload speeds are not correct, your tech support won’t send a new signal and they keep giving out blanket statements saying that theirs a multitude of issues. We need the truth and not lies each time we reach out.
Why does frontier internet suck so bad?!!! @FrontierCorp

@HeyBeadGuy @FrontierCorp Worst part is, their whole outage system has no idea they have an outage. Their system tried to schedule a technician for me, and I'm like....ughhh...what does that matter if the line is cut.
@emilyporterwv @FrontierCorp certainly @FrontierCorp must recognize the importance of their service to small business owners and be able to expedite a tech to you?

@shhaaaron @FrontierCorp I just got off the phone with tech support a little while ago. They had me reboot the ont box (mine is outside) for one minute. Yours might be in the garage. You have to uplug the power cord. When I did that I went back in and the router light was working and blue.

@WFLA and @FOX13News are you guys going to cover the recent @FrontierCorp debacle? Internet down for 3 days with vague explanations and even their customer service line putting you on a silent hold only to be hung up on.
@FrontierCorp welp, We are at 9 hours into this outage.  No updates or information from this "communication company".... Terrible service!  Don't go with @FrontierCorp !! #smh
